description:
* Based on the manga by http://anidb.net/cr1197 [Kobayashi Jin].
The clumsy second-year high school student http://anidb.net/ch72 [Tsukamoto Tenma] is always chasing after her rather unusual classmate http://anidb.net/ch73 [Karasuma Ooji], to no avail. Her over-the-top methods do not even seem to register, but she keeps trying. Meanwhile, http://anidb.net/ch70 [Harima Kenji], the class rebel, has also been desperately trying to confess his own feelings to Tenma, and his attempts fail in just the same way...

REGULAR.description:
Sophomore cutie Tenma is completely crushed out on Karasuma, but Harima has it bad for Tenma. Love letters and bicycle dates go awry, but there’s always hope for homeroom class together, right?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jännä koulunalku! / Ongelmallinen rakkauskirje! / Fillaritapaukset!
Neues Schuljahr Olé! Liebesbrief o weh! Fahrrad, ach ne!
Shingakki de Dokidoki! / Love Letter de Jitabata! / Jitensha de Dokyuun!
The New School Year! Be Still My Heart! / Love Letter Mayhem! / Warp Speed on a Bike!
新学期でドキドキ! / ラブレターでジタバタ! / 自転車でドキューン!

REGULAR.description:
Harima puts his pride on the line to save Tenma’s grade on a pop quiz! A bathroom escape with toilet tools totally sucks, and the school physical makes them both look like quacks!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blank beim Test! Toiletten-Stress! Panik beim Gesundheits-Check!
Tough Test! / Trapped in the Bathroom! / The School Physical!
Vaikea koe. / Olla tulematta ulos vessasta. / Uskomaton terveystarkastus.
Wakaranai Test! / Derarenai Toile! / Arienai Shintai Kensa!
わからないテスト! / でられないトイレ! / ありえない身体検査!

REGULAR.description:
It`s Art class. Tenma and her crush, Karasuma have paired up to sketch each other`s portrait. In spite of this one-in-a-million chance, Tenma`s efforts are fruitless again. Unexpectedly, her artistic ability is...
Finding ways to convey her feelings to Karasuma, Tenma is hinted by her favourite period drama and so begins the Arrow Message Strategy!? Can she magnificently strike Karasuma`s chest as expected?
Innocent Tenma then suggests the 4 girl-buddies to have a slumber party. She tries to get love hints from the girls but...
(by WannabeFansub)

titles.title: Mitsumete Sketch! Neratte Yabumi! Oshiete Pajama Party!
Muotokuvapiirtämistä! / Nuolikirje! / Kerro pyjamajuhlissa!
See and Sketch! / Letter on an Arrow! / Pajama Party Confessions!
Viel Wind um Porträts! Mit Pfeil und Bogen! Pyjama-Party-Fun!
見つめてスケッチ! ねらって矢文! 教えてパジャマパーティー!

REGULAR.description:
On a school field trip, Tenma fusses over a bus seat next to her crush, and Harima’s efforts to score a good spot put him in a stink! Tenma’s little sis turns out to be a mind-reader, and costume confusion on a rainy day leaves Tenma feeling pretty damp.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Buta wa Buubuu! / Neko wa Nyaa! / Kaeru mo Kappa mo Gaagaagaa!
Pigs Go Oink! / Cats Go Meow! / Frogs and Water Imps Go Ribbit!
Schweinchen machen "grunz"! Kätzchen "miau"! Was macht ein Kappa? Weiß keine Sau!
Siat sanoo röh! / Kissat sanoo miau! / Sammakot ja Kappa (hirviö) kvaak!
ブタはブーブー! / ネコはニャー! / カエルもカッパもガーガーガー

REGULAR.description:
Harima’s bullied into telling why he has the hots for Tenma! Meanwhile, the Tea Club holds a rather risqué taste-test for a classmate who just wants to get closer to Yakumo! Then it’s time for Tenma to play ball!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brennende Liebe! Dampfender Tee! Heißer Softball!
Burning Hot First Love! / Burning Hot Tea Party! / Burning Hot Softball!
Moeru Hatsukoi! / Moeru Chakai! / Moeru Soft Ball!
Palavaa rakkautta, teetä ja softballia.
燃える初恋! / 燃えるお茶会! / 燃えるソフトボール!

REGULAR.description:
Tenma has to rough it when she locks herself in a storage room at school! Harima feels the pain when his attempt to confess his love to Tenma comes to a crashing halt.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Houkago no Survival! / Kokuhaku no Toki wa Arrival! / Futarikiri no Hospital!
Nach Schulschluss: Survival! Bei der Liebeserklärung: Arrival! Nach Unfall: Hospital!
Selviytyminen! / Tunnustuksen hetki! / Yksin sairaalassa!
Survival After School! / Arrival When Confessing! / Hospital for Two!
放課後のサバイバル! / 告白の時はアライバル! / 二人きりのホスピタル

REGULAR.description:
Hanai volunteers his class to help Yakumo clean the school swimming pool, but work quickly turns to play when Harima inadvertently starts a hockey match! What’s that kid doing with a camera?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Altaan puhdistus! / Mellakka altaassa! / Sota altaassa!
Pool Cleaning! / Pool Racing! / Pool Warring!
Pool de Seisou! / Pool de Bousou! / Pool de Sensou!
Reinigung im Pool! Rowdy im Pool! Rumble im Pool!
プールで清掃! / プールで暴走! / プールで戦争!

REGULAR.description:
Tenma decides to get to Karasuma’s heart with his favorite dish - curry! A lunchbox mix-up deals a devastating blow, but Harima’s in for the biggest let down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das erste Mal: Einkaufen! Das erste Mal: Lunchpaket! Nicht das erste Mal: Liebesbrief!
Eka ostos! / Ekat eväät! / Eka tunnustus! Mitäh?
Hajimete no Okaimono! / Hajimete no Obentou! / Hajimete no Shitsuren! Eh!?
The First Shopping Trip! / The First Packed Lunch! / The First Heartbreak! Huh?!
はじめてのお買い物! / はじめてのお弁当! / はじめての失恋! えっ?

REGULAR.description:
When word gets out that Yakumo’s the star chef behind the ploy for Karasuma’s affections, Tenma braves the kitchen herself! Note: Do not feed curry to the kitty!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comic Book Blues! / Older Woman Blues! / Super Bad Water Blues!
Harmia sarjoista. / Harmia isosiskosta. / Superharmia Kappasta.
Manga de Fukou! / Onee-san de Fukou! / Kappa-san de Daifukou!
Manga! Mädchen! Kappa!
マンガで不幸! / お姉さんで不幸! / かっぱさんで大不幸!

REGULAR.description:
Friends step in to help Tenma break the lunch rut by setting up a date - with curry on the menu, of course - but a stop at a sidewalk psychic could spoil the romantic atmosphere!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Götter! Tiere! Tenma!!
Hyvä Jumala! / Hyvä ennustajaukko! / Tenma kiltti!
Onegai Kamisama! / Onegai! Real Doubutsu Uranai! / Onegai!! Tenma-chan!
Please, God! / Please, Genuine Animal Fortune-Telling! / Please, Tenma!
お願い 神さま! / お願い! リアル動物占い! / お願い!! 天満ちゃん!

REGULAR.description:
Ridiculous rain suits and bets over summer-break dates keep Tenma drenched in tension! She still has Karasuma on the brain, but Harima perks up when a punctual punch-out results in an offer he can’t refuse!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nara! / Karasuma! / Harima!
Nara! / Karasuma! / Harima!
Nara! / Karasuma! / Harima!
Nara! Karasuma! Harima!
奈良 / 烏丸! / 播磨!

REGULAR.description:
Tenma and friends head to the beach! The group pairs off for private swimming lessons, but waves of awkwardness crash down when bathing suits can’t seem to stay put!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auttakaa minua merellä! / Apua, olen alasti! / Apua, ihan totta!
Hilfe, das Meer! Hilfe, ein Mann! Hilfe, Hilfe!
Save Me at the Beach! / Save Me, I`m Naked! / Just Save Me! For Real!
Umi de Tasukete! / Hadaka de Tasukete! / Honto ni Maji de Tasukete!
海で助けて! / ハダカで助けて! / ホントにマジデ助けて!

REGULAR.description:
and she’s determined to have him confess his love - for someone else! Evening mischief brings a bunk trading debacle and pants-less pandemonium!"
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mission 1 wa Ai no Kokuhaku! / Mission 2 wa Yoru no Koubou! / Mission 3 wa Piihyororo!
Mission 1: Confession of Love! / Mission 2: Night Offense and Defense! / Mission 3: "Tweet!"
Mission1=»Unerklärbar«! Mission2=»Unschlafbar«! Mission3=»Unflötbar«!
Tehtävä 1, tunnusta rakkaus! / 2, Öinen kamppailu! / 3, Piiiip!
ミッション1は愛の告白! / ミッション2は夜の攻防! / ミッション3はピーヒョロロ!

REGULAR.description:
Tenma and Eri try to talk about the ins and outs of the manly physique, but girl time erupts into mass confusion when eavesdroppers and untimely visitors enter the mix!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hast du schon mal... ? Ist er nicht süß ? Wie wär`s mit einem Date?
Have You Ever Seen One? / Isn`t She Cute? / I Look Forward to Getting to Know You!
Mitakoto Aru? / Kawakunakunai? / Yoroshiku Onegai Shimasu!
Oletko nähnyt? / Eikö hän olekin nätti? / Hauska tavata!
みたことある? / かわいくなくない? / よろしくおねがいします!

REGULAR.description:
Things get explosive between hotheads Mikoto and Eri and Harima gets caught in the crossfire! Mikoto is ablaze over seeing an old flame at the fireworks show - but is she setting herself up to get burned?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ferien, Freundschaft, Feuerwerk.
Kesä, ystävyys ja ilotulituksia.
Natsu to / Yuujou to / Uchiagehanabi to
Summer / Friendship / Fireworks
夏と / 友情と / 打ち上げ花火と

REGULAR.description:
A Tea Club camping trip in the mountains is in order, and Tenma and the gang tag along. When Harima is put on firewood patrol with Yakumo, could he blow his chance to get closer to Tenma than ever before?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: But It`s the Tea Club... / It`s the Tea Club, But... / It`s the Tea Club, So?
Sadoubu na no ni... / Sadoubu dakedo... / Sadoubu dakara...
Teekerhosta huolimatta. / Teekerhon takia. / Siksi teekerho.
Vor dem Tee-Klub... In den Tee-Klub... Aus dem Tee-Klub...
茶道部なのに... / 茶道部だけど... / 茶道部だから...

REGULAR.description:
If girl trouble wasn’t enough, now Harima has giraffe trouble?! How’s a guy supposed to confess his love with past animal ventures nipping at his heels? School’s back in session and a classmate’s new facial hair is all the rage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giraffe im Hochsommer! Panik im Spätsommer! Neuanfang im Frühherbst!
Kirahvin kesätunteet. / Kesän paniikkijuhlat. / Muutos kesän jälkeen.
Mid-Summer Giraffe`s Night Out! / End of Summer Panic Party! / Summer`s Over-Back to School!
Natsu no Sakari no Kirin no Kimochi! / Natsu no Owari no Panic Party! / Natsu ga Sugitara Changing Now!
夏の盛りのキリンのキモチ! / 夏の終りのパニックパーティー! / 夏が過ぎたらチェンジング・ナウ!

REGULAR.description:
Karen is looking to cash in her date offer from the confident - but forgetful - Imadori, so Tenma takes her place in a wrestling match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Karen no Koi, Madamada / Karen no Koi, Bochibochi / Karen no Koi, Soshite...
Karen und die Liebe, Karen und..., Karen...
Karen`s Love, Not Yet! / Karen`s Love, Little by Little! / Karen`s Love, and Then...
Karenin rakkaus, ei vielä. Karenin rakkaus, hitaasti ja sitten...
かれんの恋, まだまだ / かれんの恋, ぼちぼち / かれんの恋, そして...

REGULAR.description:
The boys are suddenly art experts when word gets out a few girls in class are models for a mature-audiences-only exhibit! Later, it’s a perfect day for a wedding - but who’s the lucky couple? And why is Akira wearing the groom’s tuxedo?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dreams for Art! / Fantasy Wedding! / Wish on a Star!
Ein Traum von Kunst. Ein Gebet an die Götter. Ein Wunsch an die Sterne.
Geijutsu ni Yume o! / Kami ni Chikai o! / Hoshi ni Negai o!
Taideunelma. / Kautta Jumalan. / Pyydä tähdiltä.
芸術に夢を! / 神に誓いを! / 星に願いを!

REGULAR.description:
Eri clumsily clips off Harima’s precious beard, but he’ll bounce back if a certain someone approves. His latest comic needs some help, but the loner doesn’t have anyone to turn to. Have you ever heard of a damsel helping a dork in distress?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Are ga Nai! / Kore mo Nai! / Dou Shiyou mo Nai!
Fehlt was? Na das! Ach was!
Sitä ei ole! / Eikä sitäkään! / Ei mitään tekemistä!
That`s Gone! / This Is Gone! / Options, Gone!
あれがない! / これもない! / どうしようもない!

REGULAR.description:
Hanai has another bone to pick with Harima! The athletic meet approaches and the class needs more muscle - especially when the guys go gaga over the new school nurse and the injuries start to pile up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angreifend: Hanai! Leuchtend: Karen! Wiedergetroffen: das geheimnisvolle Mädchen!
Gyakushuu no Hanai! / Senkou no Karen! / Saikai, Onee-san
Hanai Fights Back! / Karen Sparkles! / Reunion with Big Sister!
Hanain revanssi! / Salamoiva Karen! / Siskän jälleennäkeminen.
逆襲の花井! / 閃光のかれん! / 再会, お姉さん

REGULAR.description:
The athlete’s battle begins, and the opposing classes are out for blood! Lara’s luchadora dreams ride on a win against her new rival, and the cavalry contest brings a surprise sacrifice on the battlefield!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf in die Schlacht! Aufgesessen! Auf und davon!
Iza Kaisen! / Saa Kibasen! / Mou Dairansen!
Taisto alkaa! / Nouse selkään! / Kauhea sotku!
Time to Start the War! / Now the Cavalry Battle! / And the Great Uprising!
いざ開戦! / さぁ騎馬戦! / もう大乱戦!

REGULAR.description:
Eri takes a timeout to confront the school nurse about her extracurricular activities with a certain delinquent! But when the girls’ relay race ends on a bad leg, the tough guy goes the distance to save the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Waffen der Frauen! Die Waffen der Männer! Entwaffnend!
Onna no Tatakai! / Otoko no Tatakai! / Tatakai Owatte...
Tyttöjen taisto! / Poikien taisto! / Taiston jälkeen...
Women`s Battle! / Men`s Battle! / After the Battle!
女の闘い! / 男の戦い! / たたかい終わって...

REGULAR.description:
Rumors fly, Eri gets jealous and something else smells fishy! Tenma’s back in the kitchen for her crush, and Harima’s latest harebrained escape from the high school hurt has him sailing on even more troubled waters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Irritation. / Indecision. / Wandering.
Shousou / Shunjun / Houkou
Stressaavaa. / Epävarmuutta. / Harhailua.
焦燥 / 逡巡 / 彷徨

REGULAR.description:
Harima returns from the stormy seas, and Tenma wants a date - but the reason is far from what his heart desires! Later, as Harima scrambles to finish his comic by the deadline, his personal assistant starts to realize his inspiration!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: (Ship.) / (Railway.) / (Guitar.)
Hooo! Puwaaan! Gyuiiin!
ボーー! プワーーン! ギュイーーン!

REGULAR.description:
Karasuma is a bit of a space case, but Harima’s imagination is out of this world! Harima will have to run like the wind to turn in his comic before it’s too late. As for Tenma, could her dream to be Karasuma’s cutie really come true?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: School Rumble Forever!

Totsuzen no "Sayonara"... Mayoikonda Labyrinth... Anata wa Dare?... Oshiete. "Surechigai" "Kataomoi" Todoke, Boku no Kimochi. Todoke, Watashi no Omoi. Tabun Ichido Shikanai Kisetsu, Seishun no 1 Page. Kore ga Saigo no Chance, Tashikametai... Kimi no Kimochi. Tsutawaru Kotoba, Tsutawaranai Omoi. Ano Hi no Kokuhaku, Eien no Ichinichi, dakedo... Itsumademo Tsuzuite Iku, Watashitachi no "Ima". Soshite Ashita e... "School Rumble Forever"

突然の「さよなら」...迷い込んだラビリンス... あなたはだれ?... 教えて. 「すれちがい」「片想い」とどけ, ボクの気持ち. とどけ, ワタシの想い. たぶん一度しかない季節, 青春の1ページ. これが最後のチャンス, 確かめたい... キミの気持ち. 伝わる言葉, 伝わらない想い. あの日の告白, 永遠の一日, だけど... いつまでも続いていく, わたしたちの「いま」. そして明日へ...「スクールランブルフォーエバー」
